org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.backpressure

类 StackTraceSampleCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.backpressure.StackTraceSampleCoordinator

  • public class StackTraceSampleCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object
    A coordinator for triggering and collecting stack traces of running tasks.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  StackTraceSampleCoordinator.PendingStackTraceSample
      A pending stack trace sample, which collects stack traces and owns a StackTraceSample promise.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.concurrent.Executor executor
      Executor used to run the futures.
      private boolean isShutDown
      Flag indicating whether the coordinator is still running (guarded by lock).
      private java.lang.Object lock 
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private static int NUM_GHOST_SAMPLE_IDS 
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,StackTraceSampleCoordinator.PendingStackTraceSample> pendingSamples
      In progress samples (guarded by lock).
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<java.lang.Integer> recentPendingSamples
      A list of recent sample IDs to identify late messages vs. invalid ones.
      private int sampleIdCounter
      Sample ID counter (guarded by lock).
      private long sampleTimeout
      Time out after the expected sampling duration.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StackTraceSampleCoordinator(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor, long sampleTimeout)
      Creates a new coordinator for the job.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        private final java.lang.Object lock

        private final java.util.concurrent.Executor executor
        Executor used to run the futures.

      • sampleTimeout

        private final long sampleTimeout
        Time out after the expected sampling duration.

      • pendingSamples

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,StackTraceSampleCoordinator.PendingStackTraceSample> pendingSamples
        In progress samples (guarded by lock).

      • recentPendingSamples

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<java.lang.Integer> recentPendingSamples
        A list of recent sample IDs to identify late messages vs. invalid ones.

        Sample ID counter (guarded by lock).

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StackTraceSampleCoordinator

        public StackTraceSampleCoordinator(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                   long sampleTimeout)
        Creates a new coordinator for the job.
        参数:
        executor - to use to execute the futures
        sampleTimeout - Time out after the expected sampling duration. This is added to the expected duration of a sample, which is determined by the number of samples and the delay between each sample.

    • 方法详细资料

      • triggerStackTraceSample

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<StackTraceSample> triggerStackTraceSample(ExecutionVertex[] tasksToSample,
                                                                                        int numSamples,
                                                                                        Time delayBetweenSamples,
                                                                                        int maxStackTraceDepth)
        Triggers a stack trace sample to all tasks.
        参数:
        tasksToSample - Tasks to sample.
        numSamples - Number of stack trace samples to collect.
        delayBetweenSamples - Delay between consecutive samples.
        maxStackTraceDepth - Maximum depth of the stack trace. 0 indicates no maximum and keeps the complete stack trace.
        返回:
        A future of the completed stack trace sample

      • cancelStackTraceSample

        public void cancelStackTraceSample(int sampleId,
                                   java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Cancels a pending sample.
        参数:
        sampleId - ID of the sample to cancel.
        cause - Cause of the cancelling (can be null).

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shuts down the coordinator.

        After shut down, no further operations are executed.

      • collectStackTraces

        public void collectStackTraces(int sampleId,
                               ExecutionAttemptID executionId,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.StackTraceElement[]> stackTraces)
        Collects stack traces of a task.
        参数:
        sampleId - ID of the sample.
        executionId - ID of the sampled task.
        stackTraces - Stack traces of the sampled task.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If unknown sample ID and not recently finished or cancelled sample.

      • rememberRecentSampleId

        private void rememberRecentSampleId(int sampleId)

      • getNumberOfPendingSamples

        int getNumberOfPendingSamples()
